other_tests.findings: Presence of right ventricular fibrosis, conduction delay, activation slowing in RVOT leading to ventricular fibrillation.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Progressive ECG changes observed, including widening of QRS and negative T wave by the end of 2001.

other_tests.findings: Induced rapid ventricular tachycardia evolving into VF, with abnormal conduction restitution in the RVOT.
Patient was heterozygous for a G1935S mutation in the SCN5A gene.
Increased ST-segment elevation from 2.5 to 3.5 mm in precordial leads.
